abstract: Jeffrey Marlow, on Green Inc. blog, interviews Bill Weihl, Google’s green energy czar.
snippet: Jeffrey Marlow, on Green Inc. blog, interviews Bill Weihl, Google’s green energy czar.
lead_paragraph: Google is a search engine, an advertising company and now a cellphone maker. But a green energy company? That too, said Bill Weihl, Google’s so-called green energy czar, in an interview with Jeffrey Marlow of The Times on the Green Inc. blog. He said:

headline.main: A Chat With Google’s Green Energy Czar
